snippet: Lawmakers will push for an independent inspector general to serve as a watchdog over the Police Department.
abstract: Lawmakers will push for an independent inspector general to serve as a watchdog over the Police Department.
lead_paragraph: The debate over whether the New York Police Department is capable of policing itself will now move to Albany, where lawmakers have proposed the creation of a permanent inspector general to investigate the Police Department.

headline.main: Albany Wants More Oversight of City Police
